Name: Board Games VR
About the game: Play board games in virtual reality as well as in non-VR mode. Currently the following games are available to play: Backgammon Checkers Tic-Tac-Toe Chess The game of chess is only available in multiplayer, since its AI is still under development. Check the game announcements for updates and more info: / You can configure the following using the menu button (on your controller or on the screen) to configure game settings: AI difficulty level music volume table height In the near future, you will be able to customize existing games as well as to make your own board games for you and the whole world to enjoy playing. This feature is currently under development. Please note that you might need a chair to sit on when playing the game. In which case, try not to injure yourself. Development of this game started as a hobby project to chill and play backgammon. After a while I decided to put all my time into it, expand it and share the game and its experience with the world. I hope you will enjoy the game! Share your constructive feedback here with me and watch them happen over time! Your feedback is valuable and appreciated. ❤️❤️❤️
